abstract: Community Service Society of New York, one of seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Carlos Oviedo pay rent and tuition.

headline.print_headline: Overcoming Setbacks and Gaining a Certification
headline.main: After Setbacks, Aiming to Go to College and Help Others in Need

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Carlos Oviedo, who lost his job and fell behind on bills when his sister became sick, is taking job-training classes while working to save money for his education....
lead_paragraph: Carlos Oviedo, who lost his job and fell behind on bills when his sister became sick, is taking job-training classes while working to save money for his education.
